name: What if your girl was a frog?
name_original: What if your girl was a frog?
description:
There was a frog. She was cheerfully croaking on her lake. However, she was not a simple frog, but magic. And so she got a lonely boy. She used her magic and started her adventures.

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (─‿‿─)♡

FEATURES

  • 🐸 Beautiful artwork
  • 🐸 Animation scenes
  • 🐸 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🐸 Relaxing music
  • 🐸 Сomics story
